reviewText: did not watch the whole movie.

The movie is chopped up and needs some artistic direction.  Low budget does not mean low creativity.  The snaps of the cartoons and the long holdings of the scene make the movie unbearable to watch.  It doesn't flow well at all.....
This is interesting if you are into the martial arts or have people trying to stab you all the time, but it's an instructional program and not a movie for entertainment.
this is a pretty good movie for it's type. i love some of these low budget films that are from other countries. this was a pretty good movie.

Terror stalks the streets of NW England where a gang of HIV-positive hoodlums are causing havoc by leaving needles around to infect people. At the same time, a pain-oblivious superhero - or vigilante - is cleaning the same streets of criminals. How these two stories intersect is very clever, and the mixing of real actors and anim-style graphics is ingenious. A promising new name in the film world.
